values: i must leave this place of desperation and woe. i have set up my new home, if anyone really wants to know about this new cubby hole, leave a comment and i shall add you.

well here i am again. writing a whole load of fucking nonsense. 

i have fallen in love once more. 

we are going to have children and lots of cats. 

including heidi and benji. 

i can't wait for us both to be out of that god forsaken fucking unit. 

hahaha.... have you ever had sex on the floor of the boy's bathroom in a psychiatric unit? 

i have.

feel good hit of the summer is mine and matthew's song. i nearly kissed him on friday. twice. we were so close, it was so intense. but blah, too much is going on in my heda. i think i am going to break up with james.. things aren't the same between us anymore. not for me anyway. routine, not relationship. BLAH!

this time last week, rachel overdosed, then she slit her wrists on monday evening. so much has happened over the past week. 

i have taken to writing again which is always a bad thing as it means depression is settling in my skin again. never gone, always lurking. shadows. no stars, just shadows. 

everything is so wrong.

i can't wait to see matthew tonight. 

so, so wrong.

i am ready to go out. we were going to the fireworks but its pissing down so we are going to nev's (james) house to get pissed and stoned and watch movies and porn and smoke ridiculous amounts of my cigarettes. RAWK! 

i am feeling rather glammed tonight. i wish rachel could see me and i wish matthew would play with my hair. *sigh* i wish jenn would share my cigarette and heather would hold my hand. life's so hard.

i didn't sleep well last night. surprise. but i slept from about half one to half 4 so i haven't got ugly UGLY bags. i have got lovely eyeliner and some cool sparkly 'ginger snap' eyeshadow on which is my mums. RAWK MUM! i left the majority of my necessities at the unit. *damn u maria*

nevermind. i hope i have fun 2nite.

*pseudo smile*

james is lying asleep in my bed, i've just lit a marlboro light 100 with my pink bic and i wish i were fuct and i were with matthew and rachel... i miss them so much. 

does anyone else worry about mixing friends and having awkward silences or icy cold eyes?

hello people. tonight i am off to see fireworks with all my lads and maybe we'll even get stoned off our fucking heads. i am starting a new life. a life of somene who doesn't give a fucking damn about herself anymore. [heart] me?!

i cut randomly and extensively last night. only on my left arm though. i think i shall attack my right arm tonight. i found out that i am allowed to recieve post at the unit, so here is the address if anyone wishes to send anything... have fun!

Maria Nagy
Simmons House Adolescent Unit
St. Lukes - Woodside Hospital
Woodside Avenue
London
N10 3HU

she scars like glitter on a candy can
she runs through the street like a camel on sand
she makes everyone look and everyone stare
for she is the girl with the diamonds in her hair

she cries green tears like the tropical sea
she sees things differently from you and me
she makes everything all creamy and light 
and she sits with the stars all through the night

she isn't quite perfect but she rarely fails,
she hugs her cigarette in hands with chipped nails,
she drinks vodka from the cap chasing it with coke
and finds herself more critical than any kind of bloke

she scars like glitter on a candy can 
and only she cant see what everyone can
she is a butterfly, one of a kind
wonderful in heart, body and mind

things are strange. i managed to have another sort of falling out with heather. i haven't heard from jenn since last night, i feel like ringing her but i'd not know what to say. i took the kids out today and it was great fun. niamh got her face apinted and we had wimpy's. it was all good :o) i saw james today. we did the craziest thing. it was excellent. i hope we do it again. and we smoked cigars walking through the woods.... and i pissed in the outdoors for the first time since i was about 5. i love going on that bike. 

i just have to quote you this 

"1 day im gonna lock u in my room wiv me n all my disney vids n make u watch em wiv me 1 by 1, n u no ur not allowed to hav sex durin disney cos its immoral!"

cute!

come and live with me at simmons house. we are all much crazier than you and you will feel so normal surrounded by all of us. everyone will love you, especially rachel and matthew. you and i can move into a double bedroom and sit up all night making plans & lists, writing poetry and painting the walls with flashes of emotion. we can wear stripy tights on mondays and fishnets on fridays and you can wear rachel's yellow tartan mini skirt and i'll wear her velvet overcoat. all three of us will dance in the moonlight and soar on the wind. matthew can join us when we put on make up only to walk face up into the rain and make pretty patterns on our cheeks. and when things get too much, i have hidden a razorblade in with my plasters... i'd share my blade with only you. [dont worry, i've been screened for all diseases and i'm clean, hehe] things would be magical there because they are REAL. you cannot shy away from reality in that house. the good comes with the bad and the good seems even more worth it in rerurn. i wish you could be there with us someday.... but it is only a dream. 

...share it with me?

it seems like everytime i go away, certain people's lives suddenly blossom and bloom and i am left with a few aching hearts with which to turn to. breeding guilt and anger and fucking frustration all at once. life seems so hard but i have it so damn easy. i just want to slit my wrists, take the pills, tie the knot and most of all, lock the door. but i can't do that. i'm not brave enough. not selfish enough. not 'depressed' enough. god i hate that word. and still, i find myself in the same position as i was in about two weeks ago. and the only person i have spoken to about it is one of my keyworkers, wendy. this means every member of staff in the unit now knows. they know of my illicit love. my volatile jealousy. my reasons for bleeding. my shameful infidelity. and it makes me want to die. if it weren't for the two or threee people i know; who also know of these things and refuse to judge me but still love me for everything else i am, i would not be able to get out of bed in the morning or get out into it at night. i wept on the plane today. i wept for james. for how much i care for him yet how badly i have screwed him over. i deserve to have a bullet blow the back of my skull off. but no, that is too worthy a death for me. write me into 1984 and have me vapourised by the thought police. for they are the only ones who can save me now.

well, i wont be posting much anymore... because i am going off to simmons house on Tuesday. i have been sorting my stuff out all afternoon and my front room is covered in clothes, books, photos, underwear and candles. i went out on Friday to the pub, i had a really lovely time, then the girls took me out last night and gave me a good send off, bought me the cutest teddy in the world and ferrero rochers!! yummy :o) i got my lip pierced on Friday... apart from that, nothing is new. i'll really miss reading everyone's entries but i'll find a way to come n post every now and then. i'll write to those of you who's addresses i have and to everyone else, i say ta-ta for now, xx
I'm silly and I like to hump! What are you?

Mark says: had a funky dream the other night subliminal sugar says: oh yeh? Mark says: was in a anti terrorist squad, and my partner was john travolta, and we was dressed in suits like pulp fiction... Mark says: and terrorists took over the leisure center Mark says: poor old john died in the explosion Mark says: i shot two terrorist with a bic biro in the head and when they were on the floor dead Mark says: the end subliminal sugar says: wow, a bic huh? i always knew they were dangerous! Mark says: yeah me too, they say the pens mightier than the sword subliminal sugar says: they sure fuckin do!

oh jenn love, if i write to you, to whom should i address the envelope? do you have any preferences?? 

*kiss kiss little one*

according to some quiz thingies i just did, i wear a thong to bed, my inner flower is an african violet and my alter ego is princess... wow, what an insight!!

*get well my little baby*

my poor miss heather has a throat infection :o( 
i could well become ill because of this, but i don't mind, *xx* 

i went to school and blah, it was boring. 

i booked my piercing for Friday - 4pm. WOO! i can't wait to get it done n get pix n stuff! 

the girls have planned a meal for Saturday night... i suppose i'll go. i fancy showing them all up but whenever i try they just make stupid compliments to counteract my silliness. nevermind.

i'm going to simmons house tomorrow and Wednesday [simmons house is the unit i may or may not be admitted to] i hope i see butterfly rachel... *sigh* i must look up what activities are on... so i can be prepared!! lol... *shiver*

i am going to read some more from my solitary practitioner's book, read some more of lolita and then plan what i shall bring to simmons house tomorrow. oh and what i shall wear.

*get better kisses for my beautiful miss heather*

i want to study medicine at imperial college london. 

there. i said it. 

i like smoking marlboro lights while listening to korn. it makes me feel good.

Written about Monday, September 2nd 

i met heather in mcd's at liverpool street. she was sitting by the window, her blonde hair resting on her shoulders. i dragged her into a photobooth and pulled her onto my lap as she complained about the bright white background of the booth. we sat and laughed at the stupidness of the pictures we took until we managed to get one we both liked and it now sits in the clear back of my bus pass holder. we made our way to oxford street and browsed the shops looking for a top for miss heather to wear that night. she found one, a revealing red halter neck that i was allowed to see in the changing rooms, my eyes fixed on her breasts, freed from her bra and in this wonderful clingy red top. it hugged the curves of her breasts and the peak of her nipples as i wanted my hands to. i loved it. we then made our way back to my house, where we agreed to watch the fast and the furious. she drank her diet coke and me my apple tango and we sat on the sofa. i offered my body as a pillow and she lay with her head in my lap, her hair sprawled across my leg. she held my hand as it lay on her chest. and i could see inside her playboy top and i studied the curve of her breast for sometime. pure beauty. every so often she would turn her head towards me to talk to me and she looked so amazing and heavenly and fragile and beautiful her hand clasping mine and i wanted to lean down and kiss her soft lips, oh how i wanted to, but the thud of my heart beat made my cheeks flush with heat at the thought of getting it wrong. throughout the film i cradled her face as she hid from the gore and stroked her head and played with her untainted hair and stroked her ribs and gently placed my hand on her breast, my heart skipping a beat as i tried to keep breathing. as the film finished, i went to the toilet and returned to find her sitting up, knees curled up to her chest and i asked for a hug. i didn't want to let her go, i did, eventually only to hug her soon again. i lay my head on her outstretched arm and closed my eyes. perfection. sitting up i kissed her forehead and bent down to kiss her cheek, kissing her lips on a detour, refusing to stop. her lips so soft and delicate, her kiss so beautiful and full of care. my heart was racing as our tongues touched and i didn't want it to end, so nervous, so excited, so overwhelmed. as our lips parted she tucked her head under my chin and i held her, utterly wowed by what had just happened. we had let go of reality as we were indulging in each other and nothing mattered but the stars i saw in her eyes. i kissed her once more on the sofa, my hand reaching again for her perfectly rounded breast and i could feel the electricity crackling in the room as i touched her. i pulled her up from the sofa and we stood together and kissed for the last time that day, i wanted to let my hands explore her whole body but these kisses were making me dizzy with longing for her. miss heather. her body. i wanted her to be mine. all mine. i could feel how horny i was having stood up and i wasn't surprised. we hugged before we left the house and managed to get to the train station very late. which was my fault for us getting the wrong train. i was sad to leave her as she disappeared into a crowd of people on the platform... all the way home i was in a total trance. under her spell. entranced by her entire being. nothing else mattered but the perfectness of those room-spinning kisses and i dreamt of so much more that night.
</lj-cut>

hmmmm... me and my mother went to simmons house for another 'family appointment' and we were waiting for a while for vicky and sarah - we were early. the social worker was buzzing around quite a bit and said hello to the old-ish guy sitting in the other office chairs. As we all went off to the classroom, rachel walked past with the social worker and we said hi and i suddenly thought, hey, that's probably rachel's dad. heh, i've met the man that helped make that beautiful being. well... possibly. she hasn't lost her glitter. i'm going for another whole day of wonderful rachel on Tuesday. they've already assigned me two key workers. hmmm... if i'm going i should be there within a month. roughly... god i couldn't sleep last night for so much stuff going on in my head. 

but enough of that, i *should* be seeing my miss heather on Sunday. if she has all her work done that is. lol

I've decided I am going to write letters. lots of them and I am going to enjoy raping the pretty virginal sheets of patterned paper.

You are Dolores Haze a.k.a. Lolita, the seductive and playful nymphet of "Lolita". You like sex and are willing to show people your 12-year-old skills! You are attracted to debonair and handsome men because you are in love with many movie stars. You're not completely pure pedophiliac dream girl, though. You are power-hungry, greedy, and throw tantrums easily but because you eminate an irrestible charm, most people give in to your every whim. Which Lolita character are you?

your compliments mean everything and nothing to me right now. I am in a state of ambivalence. I am glad I can get out of this rotting hole called hell.. my fateful appointment next week shall open the door to a new world. one of pomegranates and dark lords, not secondy checkidies and scheduled lunches. I can never make up my mind, but I know something now. I want out. 

broken record I guess... just without the blood and the tears. nothing has really changed.
oh and i'm ill. which doesn't help.
I said I would begin to work on my website again, and I will do when we have broadband, but for now I will just have fun uploading some cam pics of me, lol. I hope you like :oP

I thought I should post here seen as I haven't done for a very long time. 

I found myself in ally pally today, I wrote in a new journal type thingy for 11 long sides of A4. it was nice. I sat in the sun by the boating lake, I watched the skaters for ages and ages and ages, I watched the deer and sat on the grass for quite a while too. but I couldn't not sit and admire the view of London from that height. The trees have grown since I last stopped to look though. I generally had a nice time, getting things out of my head and embracing the world around me as well as shunning some of it. I'm glad I actually did something with my time too. I feel that I have somehow accomplished something. odd. 

I went to whsmiths and found absolutely SHITLOADS of stationary I want to buy, I'll have to budget though because its like this every year. 

stationary is my vice. it really is.

Black and white striped
pussy cat eyes
lead me to the dancefloor
hand my my suprise
take me by the waist
hold me by the hand
twist your hips and 
shake your hair -
i follow your command
rainbow lights
bright striking blue
window to the soul
i see through you
tingling sensation
in my deepest place
(you're) pinching my nipple
(you're) licking my face
dreams last foever
petals must fall
dancing here naked
fre for all.

i made fluffly pink muffins and sticky chocolate biscuit cake today. me and mother watched pitch black [vin diesel, YUM!] and pigged out like females should. it was nice... but i fell asleep and woke up feeling rotten again. i hate daytime sleeping when u have to actually do stuff later on. i've been thinking alot about people and memories and vintage belongings and fantasies. i finished price caspian last night. went to sleep at 1:45 am but stil managed to miss calls from miss heather. my mum said she'll take me shopping to brent cross on thursday. tomorrow i have to begin clearing out my rooms fro the gas men to come and do their thang. i think i am going to volunteer to help out at oxfam for some of the week. a nice little something to keep my mind occupied. i got a letter from katrina today. she was right... i wouldn't apreciate it and it did sound like she was having a go at me. but i refuse to be moody about it. i just thought she would be different... and she was. but everyone is . . . . . . . . human. i guess. "i've had it up to.... here"

My bumper sticker reads:

In English: Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.
Take the quiz.

i smell of him. inside and out. i feel like he radiates something from inside my belly. a fruit perhaps. though i bear none. 

i am surrounded by beautiful people with beautiful faces and beautiful words and beautiful friends when i myself am ugly and torn. 

i have never felt so out of place, yet so complete at the same time. something strange has happened inside of me. 'yeh... sex' those two words have changed a million and one things about myself and i am beginning to see that i will be damned forever in this hypocrisy.

in a way i beg that things will be bad again by Friday, so i might actually get the help i need. but i don't want this to ever end. i feel like i am skating upon a path of paper thin stars made of glittering ice that call out with a sigh as my blade slashes through their tiny beings one by one. a continuous moan of effervescent pleasure. i share in their relief. like orgasms rippling through my body.

in truth i am but another hideous and deformed creature longing to be accepted by the beautiful people in hope they can make me into what they are. 

dreams.

GAH! i am so tired, i read for a while and slept from around 2:45 till 6pm. i feel like shit for it and i still haven't got dressed or taken off yesterday's make up. i am such a disgusting slob!!!

i had a lovely day with sexy miss heather. she's hott hott hott ;o)

she made me this wonderful tape with lots of tacky pop tunes on it - *oooh shakira!* and she brought me 24 cd's to listen to while i waited for her to finish work. it was yum. we watched scooby and talked alot and sucked up fizzy ice blasts through straws attached to squishy type cups. we leaned agasint each other in the cinema, too shy of doing anything more, too worried about scaring the other off. that little taster has left me hungry for more *rawr* 

james is at the door! eek!

well, having spoken to paul about it, i was right... james didn't come round.

could i possibly feel any worse about myself right now?

i rang his home and all i wanted to say was sorry. sorry. and he wasn't home... all i wanted to fucking say was sorry.

why the fuck am i so upset about this?

well i haven't felt like this for a very very long time. the *special* appointment on friday will be more than welcomed. 

james has his new bike. very nice, very loud, very sexy. black. shiny. sexy.

i got my body jewelery. so the expanding might start anytime between now and monday. 

my left arm possesses 33 pretty little deep red lines and my right arm possesses 58 of them. they don't look as good after a shower though. 

blah. i wonder if james will dare show up later tonight after the fucking cold shoulder i gave him earlier. *shrug* 

we'll see.

I am sitting in my mother's classroom [she's a teacher, DOH!] on their free internet, hehe, outside in the hall, they are having an assembly, thier headmaster - Gareth - is leaving today - he is so SO cool! I don't see how anyone can not like him - unless they are like Tom Davis, but then i guess everyone hates him so there ya go... sad, sad man. but anyways, back to gareth. He's making this fat off speech and every so often a round of applause willl drown out the sound of me tapping on the keys of this really tiny imac keyboard. Its an indigo. *shekshay* 

blah. paul did a very good job of cheering me up yesterday... we decided on an arrangement. every so often he'll come round and give me anal and leave again. some casual sex here and there. sounds fun to me. 

oh and james wa off school on tuesday with a bad back - he fuct it up at badminton on monday. it was his last ever tournament, so he went all out and couldn't move the next morning. poor baby. he gave me an amazing neck massage on wednesday. it was so horny *drool*

need to take some nurofen, my decaying womb is killing me again. has been since tuesday.

pain.

*panics like a wild goose* 

I just heard James wasn't in school today... I hope nothing is wrong and that he was only off to go pick up his bike... oh jees. I'm worried now. 

*still panicking*

I really need to feel him holding me. I need to taste his lips on mine. I need to know everything is ok. Even if he is clueless. I needed to be reminded of what is real in my life. 

I don't think Paul is talking to me. 

fuck up. fuck up. fuck up.
what the fuck am i doing?????????

I can't believe I am sitting here, talking to paul about us having a hypothetical relationship. fuck, this isn't right. why am I like this? why can't I just be happy with everything I have, why do I always have to have something more???

fucking ungrateful little slut bitch whore from hell
WOOOOOO! Paul is going to pay for me to have double D's!!!

everything in my life is too good to be true. there isn't one day gone by when there hasn't been bad news. i don't want questions. ever again. i don't want anyone to talk to me. i don't want comfort from anyone. i don't want anything to do with people anymore. i just want my black room.
